doc.name: $_GET_BINARY
doc.summary: $_GET_BINARY is an array variable, translated from the QUERY_STRING. It is identical to $_GET except that it does not perform any character set translation.

description.overview:
Use the $_GET_BINARY keyword to access the array generated from the QUERY_STRING component of a URL.
For example: http://www.website.com?variable1=value1&variable2=value2
$_GET_BINARY is only available when running in CGI mode (Server).

comments.note: The data is not converted to the native character of the current platform. For example, if the query string contains unicode characters $_GET_BINARY returns the untranslated binary characters.
